metadata.name: IHGM - I Hate Greed Mode
metadata.description:
[h1] Features [/h1] [b] Enabled by default [/b]
- Characters spawn with the D20 when in greed or greedier mode. - Characters spawn with Mom's Key when in greed or greedier mode.
[b] Disabled by default [/b]
- Characters receive N amount of coins when entering the ultra greed floor. - Characters spawn with Chaos when in greed or greedier mode.
[i]Note: All features can be configured, enabled, and disabled in the source code, more information on the [url=https://github.com/emuz87/ihgm]GitHub repo.[/url][/i]
